main.name: Qusai Awwad
main.occupation: Supply Chain & Planning Analyst | Manufacturing | SAP ERP | Python
main.description: Certified Supply Chain Analyst (CSCA) with hands-on experience in manufacturing, SAP production system setup, Make-to-Order planning, inventory monitoring, and Python-based analytics.
main.bio: Certified Supply Chain Analyst (CSCA) with practical experience in production planning and manufacturing operations. Specialized in SAP ERP execution, including production order management, material control, reporting, and full production system setup. Strong background in Make-to-Order planning, inventory monitoring, and translating operational data into actionable insights through Python-based analytical tools.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to discuss supply chain planning, SAP-enabled manufacturing operations, and data-driven process improvement.

work.title: Production & Supply Chain Engineer
work.description: Analyzed production, inventory, and material data to support planning and operational decisions. Executed SAP ERP transactions for production orders, material issuance, inventory tracking, and reporting. Collaborated with warehouse and management teams to improve planning accuracy, workflow efficiency, and material flow while reducing waste. Monitored raw material availability and supported reorder planning to prevent shortages. Developed Make-to-Order production plans to meet customer demand and minimize excess inventory. Key achievement: led end-to-end SAP production system setup for the department, standardized naming and coding for raw materials and finished goods, built complete BOM structures with waste and consumption logic, customized production reports, and coordinated with the SAP implementation partner to validate configurations.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Managed production line operations to ensure efficiency, continuous improvement, and compliance with safety standards. Calculated daily production requirements to maintain output targets and stable line performance.

Certifications.descriptionofcertifications: Professional certification focused on supply chain planning, inventory management, and operational decision-making.
Applied project planning and execution fundamentals to improve delivery, coordination, and reporting quality.

Achievements.Achivedes: Achieved first place through strategic decision-making in The Fresh Connection simulation and delivery of high-impact supply chain outcomes.

Achievements.Achive: • Global Finalist – Global Student Challenge (The Fresh Connection)
Achievements.Achivedes: Advanced to the global finals by applying data-backed supply chain decisions under competitive conditions.

Achievements.Achive: • 3rd Place – ISCEA Global Supply Chain Case Competition
Achievements.Achivedes: Designed practical supply chain strategies with a focus on risk mitigation, planning effectiveness, and measurable operational improvement.

skills.name: SAP ERP Systems (Production Setup, BOM, Reporting)

projects.title: Stock Planner – Python
projects.description: Developed a Python-based planning tool to analyze stock coverage, production requirements, and planning quantities. Automated months-of-coverage and required production calculations to support data-driven planning decisions.

projects.title: Supply Chain Planning – Python
projects.description: Built an end-to-end supply chain planning and inventory analysis project to improve operational visibility and planning accuracy.

projects.title: Stock Market Data Analysis – Python
projects.description: Created a Python-based stock market analytics system using multiple indicators and data analysis methods to support evidence-based decision-making.

projects.title: Optimizing Project Management with Artificial Intelligence – Python & OpenAI
projects.description: Integrated AI and machine learning to improve capital project management through predictive modeling, automated reporting, resource optimization, and progress tracking.
